#labels Phase-Requirements
= Introduction =

This manager show all the link that exists between the current patient and other patients.

= GUI =

https://docs.google.com/drawings/pub?id=12lGFXx4xFeZcoGABej0JMZtWuXM7BKQuVDzcrDn0jhc&w=480&h=360&nonsense=something_that_ends_with.png

= Features =
The patients linked to the current one should be presented in a grid which support grouping.

A contextual menu allows to add, remove or update a relation.
